seo.title: Filecoin Plus
seo.description: Apply for DataCap with Filecoin Plus, a social layer mechanism that incentivizes all participants to make Filecoin more useful.

section_overview.heading: Current Program Goals
section_overview.subheading: To incentivize data onboarding across use cases with community governed trust mechanisms.

cards.title: Quality
cards.description: 95% of new DataCap is allocated to quality data & use cases

cards.title: Transparency
cards.description: Public visibility into all key initiatives and goals

cards.title: Enablement
cards.description: 100% of valid types of clients have a path to getting DataCap

section_program.heading: Program Scope
entries: Fil+ is designed for all client actors with quality data who engage in distributed onboarding.

Client actors can be either data owners or preparers (including SPs), who either provide some form of KYC (and KYB) information to earn social trust or prove long term commitment (i.e., collateral in a trustless notary)

Quality data is all content that meets local regulatory requirements and
  • the data owner wants to see on the network, including private/encrypted data or is open and retrievable,
  • demonstrates proof of concept
  • utility of the network, such as efforts to improve onboarding
Distributed onboarding is generally defined as: multiple physical locations and multiple storage provider entities to serve client requirements
